sentences.en: Bud turned the truck around, and started back for Dalton Pond.
sentences.cn: 巴德把卡车掉头，开始返回多尔顿池。

sentences.en: For those who live in this area, the field, pond and trees they can see from the site are not special but close to them.
sentences.cn: 对于那些在该地区生活的人来说，能从场地看到田地、池塘和树木并不特别，但胜在距离较近。

sentences.en: His pond has been choked by the fast-growing weed.
sentences.cn: 他的池塘里长满了恣意蔓生的杂草。

sentences.en: In South Africa, Jani was a big fish in a small pond.
sentences.cn: 在南非，贾尼可谓塘中无鱼虾为大。

sentences.en: Most farms have a pond from which cattle can drink.
sentences.cn: 大多数农场都有水槽让牛群饮水.

sentences.en: She chose a bench beside the duck pond and sat down.
sentences.cn: 她在鸭塘边找了条长椅坐下。

sentences.en: The boy disturbed the tranquil surface of the pond with a stick.
sentences.cn: 那男孩用棍子打破了平静的池面.

sentences.en: The cattle had trodden a path to the pond.
sentences.cn: 牛群踏出了一条通往池塘的小径.

sentences.en: The ice on that pond is unsafe for skating.
sentences.cn: 在那个池塘的冰面上溜冰不安全.

sentences.en: The path descends to  the pond.
sentences.cn: 小路下斜通到池塘。

sentences.en: The pond contains a mixture of goldfish and carp.
sentences.cn: 池塘里混养着金鱼和鲤鱼.

sentences.en: The pond stank like a sewer.
sentences.cn: 池塘像阴沟一样散发着恶臭。

sentences.en: The pond was covered in a brittle layer of ice.
sentences.cn: 池塘覆盖了一层易碎的冰.

sentences.en: The pond was full of mud and green slime.
sentences.cn: 池子里满是淤泥和绿色的污水。

sentences.en: There was an unappealing film of slime on top of the pond.
sentences.cn: 池塘表面有一层黏腻腻的污泥。

sentences.en: This pond often catches in winter.
sentences.cn: 这个池塘在冬天常常结冰。

sentences.en: This went on until one day when I was fishing with a friend of mine at a nearby pond.
sentences.cn: 这样持续了一段时间，直到有一天，当我在我的一个朋友在附近的一个池塘钓鱼。

sentences.en: Tourist numbers from across the pond have dropped dramatically.
sentences.cn: 来自大西洋彼岸的游客数量已急剧减少。

sentences.en: Water had been slowly seeping away from the pond.
sentences.cn: 池塘里的水一直在慢慢渗漏.

sentences.en: Wild flowers and grasses rimmed the little pond.
sentences.cn: 各种野花和野草环绕着这个小池塘。

words.tran_cn: 池塘,水坑,洼;鱼塘,贮水池,水库,咸水湖

trans.tran_cn: 池塘，（the pond） （非正式）大西洋
trans.tran_en: a small area of fresh water that is smaller than a lake, that is either natural or artificially made

trans.tran_cn: 拦截（流水等液体）形成小湖
